title: Fried Green Tomatoes
actors: Kathy Bates, Jessica Tandy, Mary Stuart Masterson
plot: Evelyn, an ordinary housewife, visits a nursing home and befriends the old lady Ninny. Together, they bond over stories from the past about two intrepid women of Whistle Stop Cafe.
awards: Nominated for 2 Oscars. 6 wins & 12 nominations total
